content: (pretty sure we can't use it for rust-lang/rust btw, it'd break bors)
Not that I'm volunteering, but the time savings associated with only rerunning failed jobs seems like it might be worth adjusting bors.
Or is it a fundamental incompatibility with The Bors Concept (tm)
don't have time right now to elaborate more (work thing), but by the time you re-run the failed jobs the queue would've moved forward, so even if the job passed bors wouldn't be able to merge it
and every time bors re-runs a PR it generates a new merged commit
